selectTheOptionDesc.title: Selecteer de optie die het beste je probleem beschrijft.
selectTheOptionDesc.note: The user will see this UI when they're running into issues with a given website, that we may be causing

pickYourIssueFromTheList.title: Kies je probleem in de lijst ...
pickYourIssueFromTheList.note: Asks the user to pick a specific list from the pulldown

videos.title: Video werd niet afgespeeld
videos.note: User is reporting this page because a video didn't play

images.title: Afbeeldingen zijn niet geladen
images.note: User is reporting this page because one or more images did not load

comments.title: Opmerkingen zijn niet geladen
comments.note: User is reporting this page because one or more comments did not load

content.title: Inhoud ontbreekt
content.note: User is reporting this page because some other type of content did not load

links.title: Links of knoppen werken niet
links.note: User is reporting this page because one or more links or buttons did not work when clicked

login.title: Ik kan niet inloggen
login.note: User is reporting this page because they are unable to log into the website

paywall.title: De site heeft me gevraagd om uit te schakelen
paywall.note: User is reporting this page asked them to disable their privacy or ad blocking extension

other.title: Iets anders
other.note: User is reporting this page because of some other reason than the ones we listed

reportBrokenSite.title: Defecte website melden
reportBrokenSite.note: Title for reporting broken website view

tellUsMoreDesc.title: Vertel ons eventueel over het probleem dat je hebt ondervonden
tellUsMoreDesc.note: A hint for a text box that lets user enter free text to describe their problem

reportsAreAnonymousDesc.title: Rapporten die naar DuckDuckGo worden verzonden, zijn 100% anoniem en bevatten alleen je selectie hierboven, je optionele beschrijving, de URL en een lijst met trackers die we op de site hebben gevonden.
reportsAreAnonymousDesc.note: A small disclaimer at the bottom of the view describing what is included in the report

thankYou.title: Dankjewel!
thankYou.note: Title for what the user sees upon submitting the report

yourReportWillHelpDesc.title: Je rapport helpt ons om de browser Ã©n de ervaring voor anderen te verbeteren.
yourReportWillHelpDesc.note: Body that the user sees upon submitting the report
